title: The Everything Jumbo Book of Large-Print Word Searches, Volume 2: 160 Supersized Puzzles for Hours of Entertainment (2)
features: Let the word search begin with more than 150 large-print puzzles in this new volume of
The Everything Jumbo Book of Large-Print Word Searches.
The Everything Jumbo Book of Large-Print Word Searches, Volume 2

is perfect for puzzlers weary of small type and tight spacing in word search books. Packed with more than 150 puzzles in an easy-on-the-eyes format, this collection features puzzles with themes like sports, popular culture, books, TV characters, animals, and vacation destinations.
description: Charles Timmerman is the founder of Funster.com, a word game website that was selected as a Yahoo! Pick of the Year, and the author of more than 100 puzzle books, including
The Everything Jumbo Book of Large-Print Bible Word Searches
The Everything Giant Book of Word Searches (Volumes 1 to 4)
The Everything Easy Word Search Book
